tasks.label: flash
tasks.command: openocd -f interface/stlink.cfg -f target/stm32f4x.cfg -c 'program build/tinyThreads_F4.elf verify reset exit'

tasks.label: mass erase
tasks.command: openocd -f interface/stlink.cfg -f target/stm32f4x.cfg -c 'init; reset halt; stm32f4x mass_erase 0; exit'

tasks.label: wipe & flash
tasks.command: openocd -f interface/stlink.cfg -f target/stm32f4x.cfg -c 'program build/tinyThreads_F4.elf verify reset exit'
